generated_title: Vladimir Putin says Moscow is ready to provide "uninterrupted shipments" of fuel to India. Comes as Delhi faces pressure from the US to stop buying Russian oil. President Donald Trump has imposed 50% tariffs on most Indian products.

title: Germany votes to bring in voluntary military service programme for 18-year-olds

title: Trump hails 'historic' peace deal between DR Congo and Rwanda
generated_title: The leaders of DR Congo and Rwanda have signed a peace deal. The deal is aimed at ending the long-running conflict in the region. But analysts have pointed out that this was just the endorsement of an agreement reached in June.
